records.Body: What do you do if your dog chews a dictionary? Take he words out of his mouth!
What happens when it rains cat and dogs? I don't know, but you can step into poodle.
Why can't a leopard hide? Because he's always spotted.
Where do milkshakes come from? Nervous cows
What's black and white and blue? A depressed zebra.
What did the duck say when buying lipstick? Put it on my bill.
Why were the early days of history called the dark ages? Because there were so many knights.
What is the fruitiest subject in school? History, because it's full of dates.
How was the Roman Empire cut in half? With a pair of Ceasers.
How do you call a medieval dentist? A plaque doctor.
What's a mummy's favourite type of music? Wrap.
What did pharaon say when he saw the pyramid? Mummy's home!
